name: General and preventive care
description: A wide range for a preventive and general dentistry care. We put focus on examining root canals and the overview state of teeth’s health.

name: Cosmetic solutions
description: Our range of cosmetic dentistry solutions includes such vitals as teeth whitening as well as a laser dentistry.

name: Restorative solutions
description: Restoring teeth in bad condition is what we specialize in. It may include laser restoration and Invisalign service.

name: Additional treatments
description: People’s dentistry issues may vary. That’s why we have a lot of non-conventional treatments, including X-ray scanning.

name: Dentures & denture repair
description: If you need a new denture or if you’re in need of fixing your old one, broken denture – we’re at your service!

name: Pediatric dentistry
description: It’s crucial to check Children’s Oral Health even more often, than the adults’ teeth. That is due to baby teeth, and we know how to fix that!
